name: Stolen Princess
description:
The princess has vanished from her own wedding and now an army of monsters is seeminginly holding her hostage. Will the Prince be able to get his princess back or is she lost forever?

In this Tower defense game you play an army of monsters trying to keep the princess with the evil Overlord. Defend the monsters lair from the kingdom coming to save the princess.

Developer: Jonas Natzuup

Sound: Max Raddi

Art: Robin RobinGrunder, Phillip  KuchenHusky, Lava Lavados28

Credits:

Music by Waterfllame
